keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make taxation fairer with a proposal that polluters and the rich pay their fair share, ensuring anyone earning under £10,000 would pay no tax in Devon.
Ensure schools get enough money, addressing that the Lib Dem pupil premium would bring £26 million more to Devon's schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for the vulnerable and elderly
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide respite support for carers, restore the pensions' earnings link, protect the over 60s free bus pass from Tory cuts, and invest to make homes warmer.
Support restorative justice schemes where people have to face up to their crimes and make amends to their victims, and to follow proven success in reducing crime.

Encourage a strong local economy, support tourism, farming, small businesses and engineering. Also proposing to increase credit available to businesses and more apprenticeships and training for young people.

issues.socialWelfare: Provide respite support for carers, restore the pensions' earnings link, protect the over 60s free bus pass from Tory cuts, and invest to make homes warmer.

images.caption: Left: Adam with Lib Dem economies chief Vince Cable.
